document.heading: Attorney General Subpoena Authority Authorization Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-376, the “Attorney General Subpoena Authority Authorization Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-1009, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2010, and December 7, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 20, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-712 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-376 became effective on June 3, 2011.
